title: Glitch/Bug/IDK Lost me Ranked game
body: Riot IDK if I should put this under this board or not but I just lost a ranked game because of a bug in your game. I was playing a close ranked game, and as we were engaging in the game deciding teamfight, my game started freezing up and everyone was teleporting around seemingly randomly. It got really crazy and I don't even know what happened. It was 100% not internet, as my internet was working fine, my songs I was listening to were still loading and playing, and when I tried to DC/REC to fix it, I could connect to the network and I could chat, but when I tried to reconnect, it wouldn't let me and saying I should check my network! This lost me a ranked game I am mad riot please help me.

replies.body:
The description of your symptoms is consistent with those of packet loss or high packet buffering. I suspect this was a big burst of packet loss that prevented your client from establishing a stable connection with the server. This could have been caused by something local to your network or it could have been a momentary issue with ISP routing to the server.

If this happens again, let me know, but I'd recommend ensuring your local settings are compatible with League using our [network guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a preventative measure. Let me know if you have any questions.

My internet was doing fine, everything else was loading smoothly and the music i was listening to on youtube was still loading at normal speed.

Different servers and services are in different geolocations, therefore you could have a good connection to youtube or another game, but encounter problems to League. Additionally, services like youtube don't rely on syncing actions and data with the server every second, so you're much less likely to notice packet loss to those services.

I definitely recommend working through that guide to ensure we've checked your local network settings properly. Let me know the results of those steps.

I have a question, what do I do if the client crashes during load screen 5 times in a row (happened just 2 minutes ago) and I get leaverbustered because I couldn't make it in time for remake after restarting my computer?

Is there a specific error message that pops up when this happens? [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) starts taking action once there's a trend of disconnections, and in this situation, it sounds like this may have happened a few times across a few different matches.
